thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 41 of 564
thread.title: Stay Hendershot

author: Stay Hendershot
title: Stay Hendershot
text: This was my first time shopping the online store and I signed up for the VIP membership. The shopping was easy and the VIP Membership benefits and rules were laid out very clealry. The stock of some of the items was not always great and they didn't always have the color and the sizes but I still found something i liked. I was gifted a pair of workout capris and they are amazing! I can't wait to receive my outfit.
